data.title: Anna Elizabeth Nelson Obituary
data.meta_description: ANNA ELIZABETH NELSON, (NEE Freburger), age 79, of Holand, Ohio, formerly of Sarasota, Florida and Edgewood, Maryland, died suddenly on January 3, 2004.  She is survived by her...
data.text:
ANNA ELIZABETH NELSON, (NEE Freburger), age 79, of Holand, Ohio, formerly of Sarasota, Florida and Edgewood, Maryland, died suddenly on January 3, 2004. She is survived by her loving husband of 54 years, Frederick L. Nelson, Jr.; sons, Frederick L. III (Mary) of Perrysburg, Ohio; Michael R. (Kathleen) of Aurora, Colorado; Timothy J. (Gail) of Stewartstown, Pennsylvania; Joseph P. (Celia) of Lewis Center, Ohio; daughter, Elizabeth A. Kirkham (Rodney) of Springboro, Ohio; two sisters, Catherine A. Staylor of Baltimore; and Virginia H. Lanasa of Baltimore, Maryland.. Anna was preceded in death by son Francis G. Nelson, whose widow Tracey Nelson Andrejak of Kingsville, Maryland is still part of the family, and one brother, Thomas E. Freburger.. Ten grandchildren also survived her.

In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to American Leukemia Research Foundation, 8600 LaSalle Road, Suite 314, Chester Building, Baltimore, Maryland 21286 or to the Alzheimers Disease Association, 1850 York Road, Suite D, Baltimore, Maryland 21093-5142 or to the charity of the donor=s choice.
